DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Parents high-risk infant randomly assign 1 4 group ; group alternate site sequence group site randomly assign . The first group receive 90-minute , 1-person cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) obstruct airways management instruction . The second group receive instruction plus 1-hour social support discussion . Ongoing support provide weekly phone call assess caretaker status answer question regard infant 's health . The third group learn CPR use self-paced multimedia learning module . The control group receive standard CPR instruction hospital discharge . Participants follow 2 week , 3 6 month .
